name: Big Blue Whale Survival 3D - Try whale simulator, be ocean animal!
name_original: Big Blue Whale Survival 3D - Try whale simulator, be ocean animal!
description:
Be an ocean whale in the survival simulator!

Forget about boring human's life with Big Blue Whale Survival 3D! Complete missions and explore the ocean full of tasty plankton. Kill sharks, look for treasures and breath! Always control your oxygen level. Fight with ocean enemies to help animals or run away. Level­up your animal to improve whale survival skills. Then form a pod and breed a whale!

Features of Big Blue Whale Survival 3D:

- Challenging missions
- Animal survival and quests mode
- Cruel ocean atmosphere simulator
- Ocean predators
- Many animal species
- Whale families
- Limited oxygen

Explore the ocean with whale and avoid sharks! You are a giant animal, but your life is in danger! Start your ocean adventures with our simulator. Turn on a whale survival mode. Try to knock down every ocean animal in the survival simulator. There is a map in the animal survival simulator to help you. Try how to ride the animal, eat and even kill. Explore all places in the simulator and do many animal things.

It is hard to be an animal? With our simulator you can check it. Try it! Jump out of the ocean for oxygen and never sleep in the survival simulator. Who knows what animal is near in the ocean?! This whale survival simulator is not easy, make your whale pod, explore the ocean. Breed a whale. Your animal mates will follow you in the ocean. But in this simulator they can die. Think about their survival.

Big Blue Whale Survival 3D lets you to be in whale's skin as if you are a real ocean animal. A pure animal survival. Wait... Hear? The ocean is calling.

We can't wait when you start playing Big Blue Whale Survival 3D!
